Yangzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
speaker

to praise/to commend

sentences.english: Uncertainty may exist in dealing with the mechanism of local uplift anomaly on dam foundation.
sentences.chinese: 壩基局部揚壓力異常機理的分析中通常存在不確定性。

sentences.english: Gheryan town liberated green flags flying in all top destinations.
sentences.chinese: 蓋爾揚解放，高處綠旗飛揚。

sentences.english: Lambs frisk and play, the shepherds pipe all day.
sentences.chinese: 羊羔歡躍喜洋洋，牧童整天笛聲揚。

sentences.english: And as they cried out, and cast off their clothes, and threw dust into the air
sentences.chinese: 衆人喧囔，摔掉衣裳，把塵土向空中揚起來。

sentences.english: Aborigines kick up dust in a dance at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 土著居民日落時的舞蹈能把灰塵揚起來。

sentences.english: Uncle Homayoun held her by the shoulders in an attempt to comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 荷馬揚叔叔摟着她的肩試圖寬慰她。

sentences.english: I wrote an long article yesterday, but I didn't save it.
sentences.chinese: 揚灑灑寫了一篇文章，結果沒存盤。

sentences.english: Since the beginning of this year, the organization in Abyan province frequent attacks.
sentences.chinese: 自今年年初以來，該組織在阿比揚省內頻繁發動襲擊。

sentences.english: Mr. Stevenson was mentioned in the annual report for his cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文生先生因樂於合作在年度報告中被提名錶揚。

sentences.english: The soldier was mentioned in dispatches.
sentences.chinese: 這名士兵在戰報中受到提名錶揚。

sentences.english: Now, Devarajan fears Africa will also lag behind in recovery.
sentences.chinese: 德瓦拉揚擔心，非洲的復甦進程也將滯後。

sentences.english: Uncle Homayoun and his manservant occupied the entire upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 荷馬揚叔叔和他的男僕佔着整個頂樓。

sentences.english: Is your character still close to them or have you grown apart?
sentences.chinese: 你的角色仍然跟他們很親密，還是已經分道揚鏣？

sentences.english: He knows to keep a heart of conscience and not to spread others' mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 他懂得不會將自己的心田昧，更不會把他人的過失揚。

sentences.english: Unlike many men who lived long after, Henry Young did not die in vain.
sentences.chinese: 與許多苟且偷生的人不同，亨利揚不要白白地死去。
